text.content: The blog you are viewing right now is created using Next.js. Here are some references that I used to make NextJS blog App. I will give detailed instructions on how I created this blog if I have some time later.

rich_text.plain_text: The blog you are viewing right now is created using Next.js. Here are some references that I used to make NextJS blog App. I will give detailed instructions on how I created this blog if I have some time later.

text.content: One thing I want to mention is that I used Notion API to get blog data from Notion but it sucks. Publicly available rendering code doesn’t support nested list items and tab indentation. So I partially blame bad formatting of my blogs to Notion API.
